scripts.build: npm run build:theme && npm run build:blocks
scripts.dev: npm run build:blocks && concurrently "npm run start" "npm run start:blocks"
scripts.dev:blocks: npm run build:blocks && cross-env NODE_ENV=development wp-scripts start --blocks-manifest --config ./node_modules/@wordpress/scripts/config/webpack.config.js --webpack-src-dir=./assets/src/blocks --output-path=./assets/build/blocks
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.phpcs:report: if [ -d vendor ]; then vendor/bin/phpcs --standard=WordPress-VIP --report=summary; else echo 'PHP CodeSniffer not installed - run composer install'; fi
scripts.phpcs:fix: if [ -d vendor ]; then vendor/bin/phpcbf --standard=WordPress-VIP; else echo 'PHP CodeSniffer not installed - run composer install'; fi
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && npm run update-block-versions && npm run changelog
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && npm run update-block-versions && npm run changelog
scripts.version:major: npm version major && npm run update-block-versions && npm run changelog
scripts.update-block-versions: find assets/src/blocks -name "block.json" -exec sed -i 's/\"version\": \".*\"/\"version\": \"'$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')'\"/g' {} \;
